passage_text: Mattress Salesmen. Both Simply Hired and Indeed also published salary information in 2011 that is specific to sales personnel with a direct focus on mattress sales. At the time of publication, Simply Hired estimates that the average annual salary for mattress salesmen is near $47,000. Salespersons with extensive knowledge of mattresses, expansive sales and retail management experience and who have great leadership skills can often find careers as mattress showroom managers. According to Indeed and Simply Hired, mattress showroom managers can earn anywhere from $38,000 to $45,000 per year in 2011. Such salaries begin near -- and extend beyond -- the BLS earnings projections for the 90th percentile of retail salespersons positions in May of 2008
